mapper.select: select rownum,t.* from (select * from tender order by t_creation_date asc) t order by rownum desc

select x.* from(select rownum as rnum,a.* from(select rownum,t.* from (select * from tender order by t_creation_date asc) t order by rownum desc) a where rownum <= #{endnum} ) x where x.rnum>=#{startnum}
select tender_code from tender where tender_code=#{tender_code}

select t.tender_code, t.tender_title, to_date(t.t_creation_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as t_creation_date, t.service_date, t.tender_deadline, t.floor_number, t.member_id, count(re.original_code) as report_count from (select * from tender order by t_creation_date asc) t , report re where t.tender_code = re.ORIGINAL_CODE(+) group by t.tender_code, t.tender_title, to_date(t.t_creation_date,'YY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS'), t.service_date, t.tender_deadline, t.floor_number, t.member_id
select count(*) from tender t, bid b where t.tender_code=b.tender_code and t.tender_code=#{tender_code} and win_bid_whether='y'
